name: Task Rules
snippet: Create tasks on demand, usually by naming patterns. Also used to provide dynamic upload, build and clean tasks.

name: Dependency Resolution Strategies
snippet: Create tasks on demand, usually by naming patterns. Also used to provide dynamic upload, build and clean tasks.

name: Changing Dependencies
snippet: Changing dependencies are mutable. Version numbers ending in -SNAPSHOT are changing by default. Default TTL is 24 hours.
